mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna(qna_id, qna_title, qna_content, qna_view, qna_writer) VALUES (#{qnaId}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaView}, #{qnaWriter})
mapper.select: SELECT c.qna_comment_id AS id, c.qna_comment_content AS content, c.qna_comment_harmful AS harmful, q.qna_id AS articleId, u.user_id, u.user_name FROM qna q INNER JOIN qna_comment c ON q.qna_id = c.qna_id INNER JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE q.qna_id = #{qnaId}
